Summary: 3 solid lights, flashed in progression. Several smaller lights on desert floor
divs: sighting detailsi observed 3 lights above the deset sky at about 3am. i was traveling south on highway 95, heading towrds las vegas. i observed a lightning storm ahead of me about 40-60 miles ahead of me. i also observed a commercial air liner traveling ne in the night sky. as i was watching the air liner, a large white light or orb appeared in the sky. it fades into view for a second, then faded away. then another light appeared next to that, fading in and out and then finally a third light appeard after that. all in succession or sequence. then they were gone. clear summer night with 3\4 moon for light. i could clearly see the mountain range below the lights. there were no radio or transmission towers near my location. it was not that. i observed for about 10 minutes and the event did not happen again. as i drove further, about 45 min since the light event, i slowed down to observe what looked like flashlights being used in the middle of the desert. i saw what appeared to be 6-8 flashlights being used to search the desert floor for something. like watching people search for their car keys or something. the lights scanned the desert floor in random patterns. i slowed to about 10 mph to look for the vehicle that might have brought the persons out to the desert. no vehicle in sight. nothing. then i stopped completely and turned to look at the lights again. i could see the lights dancing about the desert floor but i could not see any people. no one there holding a flashlight, just the lights. there was no origin of the lights. no people, no flashlights. just the circle of lights on the ground. this happened again about 5 min further down the road. this time the lights were light small led bulbs lit on the desert floor. about 20 yards off the highway. all clustered together in a random pattern. about 10-12 small lights, glowing about 6" off the ground. i stopped my vehicle and got my flashlight and went to investigate. i arrived at the area where the lights were, but they were gone and left no trace.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Winnemucca
There were no other sightings in Winnemucca on or around August 18th 2011
